title: High-end coffee growers reluctantly embrace bitter bean
text:
High-end coffee growers reluctantly embrace bitter bean 11:02am GMT - 01:50 
A growing number of farmers in coffee growing nations like Nicaragua and Guatemala are dedicating more land to a cheaper, bitter coffee bean for profit and durability. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A growing number of farmers in coffee growing nations like Nicaragua and Guatemala are dedicating more land to a cheaper, bitter coffee bean for profit and durability. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BfeKoW
